RenderViewProxy.name: zSpaceView
RenderViewProxy.label: zSpace view
RenderViewProxy.Documentation: This view allows to render the scene using Crystal Eyes stereo and interact with it through a zSpace device. The zSpace device is composed of a high definition 3D display coupled with an advanced mixed reality tracking system and angle-awareness sensor. This view is designed to work on full screen (or in a cave display). This plugin only works on Windows as the zSpace SDK is only available on this OS. The stylus is used to interact with the scene : The middle button allows to position an actor, the right button performs an hardware picking to inspect the data, and the left button initiate a clip on the data.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawStylus
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility of the stylus ray.

IntVectorProperty.name: InteractivePicking
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether the picking of actor is done in real time or not.

IntVectorProperty.name: PickingFieldAssociation
IntVectorProperty.label: Picking Field Association
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose whether the ray is used to pick cells, or points.
